title: Photo of East African German troops, World War I

content.prompt: The photograph above of German East African troops best illustrates which of the following historical processes during the First World War?

choices.label: The increasing inclusion of non-Europeans in European conflicts
The undermining of European claims to moral superiority as a result of the destructiveness of the First World War
The development of African nationalism as a consequence of Africans’ involvement in European wars
The gradual extension of self-rule to Europe’s African colonies in the face of anticolonial protests by Africans

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
